item.title: Cortana v0.2 - Second Release
item.description: Cortana v0.2 now includes a wide variety of visual and quality of life enhancements, such as improved icons, toggleable items/headers/logos, and more!

item.title: Cortana v0.1 - First Release
item.description: Thank you for downloading Cortana 0.1! There are plenty more features to be implemented soon, so keep your eyes peeled for more updates on this page!
